string.value: You gave the potions to the #p1063018#. Will you now be able to get the herbs back? Go to #b#m105070300##k.
The #p1063018# returned the herbs to you while repeating his apologies. Now take the herbs to #p1061005#.
#p1061005# has now got his possessions back and is no longer suspicious of #m103000000#.

Here is the Herb I stole. I've already used a little of it, but no one will be able to tell. Please return #bthe Herb to its owner#k. I'm sorry for the inconvenience I've caused. Please apologize to the owner for me.
I'll never do anything like this ever again. You're a lifesaver. Thank you so much for your help!
Hm? Don't you need the Herb back? If not, can I keep it?
It's been a long time, Evan. Have you heard anything about my Herb? I don't want to rush you, but there isn't anything else for me to do but blame #m103000000# for my stolen Herb. What? You found it?
Oh, that's it! That's definitely my Herb! Wait, let me take a look!
You haven't returned the Herb to its #bowner#k? I stole it from the man with a long face in #m105040300#. Could you also tell him that I am very sorry?
You haven't found the culprit that has stolen my Herb? See, it's gotta be one of those thieves in #m103000000#. What? You found the real culprit? Then go on and find my Herb for me. Hurry.
Umm, hello there, lifesaver. Has anyone ever told you that you're a bit clumsy? You left the Herb here. I've been trying so hard not to use it until you came to get it. Please return it to its owner.
